column4: How do I disable the auto disk check, after X number of restarts
if you now what is good for you you leave it   you shouldn'T be rebooting that often anyway,  leave it on it is very usefull
How do at least enable output then? Everytime I get to that point it sits at a black screen for the amount of time it takes
not sure what you mean,  and I don'T think I would be able to tell you how to fix it anyway,   it's running fsck , it can't do that while it finishes booting
